verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy mercy, my God, is the theme of my song The joy of my heart and the boast of my tongue Thy free grace alone from the first to the last Hath won my affection and bound my soul fast.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Without Thy sweet mercy I could not live here Sin would reduce me to utter despair But through Thy free goodness my spirits revived And He that first made me so keeps me alive.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy mercy is more than a match for my heart Which wonders to feel its own hardness depart Dissolved by Thy goodness I fall to the ground And weep to the praise of the mercy Iâ€™ve found.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Great Father of mercies Thy goodness I own And the covenant love of Thy crucified Son All praise to the Spirit whose whisper divine Seals mercy and pardon and righteousness mine!{/lang-eng}
